### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=-40.5, y=40.5)
Consists of steam engine at position(x=-40.5, y=40.5) but it is not connected to power network, has no input liquid and no fluid present in connections.

### Boiler at position(x=1.5, y=1.0)
Consists of boiler at position(x=1.5, y=1.0) connected to pipes at positions (x=-0.5, y=1.5), (x=3.5, y=1.5) and has a fluid box with water.

### Boiler at position(x=1.5, y=3.0)
Consists of boiler at position(x=1.5, y=3.0) connected to pipes at positions (x=-0.5, y=3.5), (x=3.5, y=3.5) and has a fluid box with water.

### Offshore pump at position(x=-7.5, y=25.5)
Consists of offshore pump at position(x=-7.5, y=25.5) connected to pipes at position(x=-7.5, y=24.5) but has no fluid present in connections.

### Offshore pump at position(x=-18.5, y=27.5)
Consists of offshore pump at position(x=-18.5, y=27.5) connected to pipes at position(x=-19.5, y=27.5) but has no fluid present in connections.

### Offshore pump at position(x=-16.5, y=26.5)
Consists of offshore pump at position(x=-16.5, y=26.5) connected to pipes at position(x=-16.5, y=25.5) and has a fluid box with water.

### Offshore pump at position(x=-13.5, y=26.5)
Consists of offshore pump at position(x=-13.5, y=26.5) connected to pipes at position(x=-13.5, y=25.5) but has no fluid present in connections.

### Offshore pump at position(x=-3.5, y=27.5)
Consists of offshore pump at position(x=-3.5, y=27.5) connected to pipes at position(x=-3.5, y=26.5) and has a fluid box with water.

### Offshore pump at position(x=-1.5, y=28.5)
Consists of offshore pump at position(x=-1.5, y=28.5) connected to pipes at position(x=-1.5, y=27.5) and has a fluid box with water.

### Offshore pump at position(x=0.5, y=30.5)
Consists of offshore pump at position(x=0.5, y=30.5) connected to pipes at position(x=1.5, y=30.5) but has no fluid present in connections.

### Boiler at position(x=-24.5, y=32.0)
Consists of boiler at position(x=-24.5, y=32.0) connected to pipes at positions (x=-26.5, y=32.5), (x=-22.5, y=32.5) and has a fluid box with water.

### Offshore pump at position(x=1.5, y=32.5)
Consists of offshore pump at position(x=1.5, y=32.5) connected to pipes at position(x=2.5, y=32.5) but has no fluid present in connections.

### Pipe group at fluid system 480548
Consists of pipes at various positions including (x=-5.5, y=-8.5), (x=-4.5, y=-8.5), (x=-3.5, y=-8.5), (x=-27.5, y=34.5), (x=-24.5, y=34.5), (x=-25.5, y=34.5) and is working.

### Pipe group at fluid system 480571
Consists of pipes at various positions including (x=3.5, y=-2.5), (x=5.5, y=-2.5), (x=4.5, y=-2.5), (x=3.5, y=-1.5), (x=2.5, y=-1.5), (x=2.5, y=-0.5) and is empty.
